Entry.JapaneseText: またラジルダかあ。 あの街、あんまり好きじゃないんだよネ。
Entry.EnglishText: We're going to Razilda again? I don't like that town very much.

Entry.JapaneseText: おれもだ。自然も多くて、いい街だとは思うけど、 住んでるヤツの根性がねじ曲がってるよな。
Entry.EnglishText: Me neither. I think it's a nice town with plenty of nature, but the guys that live there are twisted.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Blue>思念<White>が満ちてるからって、アレはヒドイよね。 まともな人なんて、数えるほどしかいないし。
Entry.EnglishText: It's so awful there because the <Blue>Will<White> has overtaken the town. There's only a handful of decent people there.

Entry.JapaneseText: ……なんかボクたち、 珍しく意見が合ったネ。
Entry.EnglishText: ...It's not often that we agree on something.
